# ===================================================================
# Dependencies & Lock Files
# ===================================================================
# This folder contains locally installed packages. It can be very large
# and should never be committed, as it can be regenerated from package.json.
node_modules/

# Log files generated by package managers.
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*


# ===================================================================
# Build & Output
# ===================================================================
# This directory contains the compiled JavaScript output from your TypeScript code.
# The principle is to only manage the source code (src) and not the build artifacts.
dist/
build/
.next/


# ===================================================================
# Environment Variables ( VERY IMPORTANT! )
# ===================================================================
# These files contain sensitive information like API keys and database passwords.
# For security, they must never be committed to Git.
.env
.env.*
!.env.example  # However, we want to include the example file to show what variables are needed.


# ===================================================================
# Logs & Cache
# ===================================================================
# Log files generated during application runtime.
logs/
*.log
*.log.*

# Cache files or temporary data.
.cache/
coverage/ # Test coverage reports


# ===================================================================
# IDE & Editor Directories
# ===================================================================
# These files are specific to each developer's local IDE/editor setup
# and should not be included in the repository.
.vscode/
.idea/
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.swp


# ===================================================================
# OS Generated Files
# ===================================================================
# System files automatically generated by various operating systems.
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db
